## EthersLiquityConnectionOptionalParams.userAddress property

Address whose Trove, Stability Deposit, LQTY Stake and balances will be read by default.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly userAddress?: string;
```

## Remarks

For example [getTrove(address?)](./arth-lib-ethers.ethersliquity.gettrove.md) will return the Trove owned by `userAddress` when the `address` parameter is omitted.

Should be omitted when connecting through a [Signer](./arth-lib-ethers.etherssigner.md)<!-- -->. Instead `userAddress` will be automatically determined from the `Signer`<!-- -->.
